definition: ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in

sentences.english: He was grappling with an alligator in a lagoon.
sentences.chinese: 他正在环礁湖里与一只短吻鳄搏斗。

sentences.english: Addu atoll is almost completely covered with banana trees and bushes in bloom.
sentences.chinese: 阿杜环礁是几乎完全覆盖着芭蕉树和盛开的灌木丛。

sentences.english: Bairiki, on Tarawa atoll, is the administrative center. Population, 56,213.
sentences.chinese: 位于塔拉瓦环礁上的拜里基是行政中心。

sentences.english: The American forces seized the Gilbert Island Atoll from the Japanese. (AP Photo)
sentences.chinese: 美军从日本人手中夺取了吉尔伯特岛的这处环礁。

sentences.english: This astronaut photograph features Mataiva Atoll, the westernmost atoll of the Tuamotu chain.
sentences.chinese: 这张太空照片是其最西边的马太瓦环礁的图像。

sentences.english: France has carried out an underground nuclear explosion on Mururoa Atoll in the South Pacific.
sentences.chinese: 法国已经在南太平洋的穆鲁罗瓦环礁进行了地下核爆。

sentences.english: These snails do not occur on low-lying coral islands or atolls.
sentences.chinese: 在地势低平的珊瑚岛或环礁上没有这种螺。

sentences.english: Bairiki, on Tarawa atoll, is the administrative center. Population, 5', 23.
sentences.chinese: 位于塔拉瓦环礁上的拜里基是行政中心。

sentences.english: Gan is the largest island in Addu atoll in the island nation of Maldives.
sentences.chinese: 阿杜甘是在环礁岛国马尔代夫最大的岛屿。

sentences.english: Dongsha marine park could be a model for how to handle other disputed islets.
sentences.chinese: 东沙环礁国家公园也许可以作为其他争议之岛的借镜。

definition: lagoon/erroneously written 瀉湖|泻湖[xie4 hu2]

pinyin: Ma3 li3 ya4 na4 Qun2 dao3

definition: Paracel Islands, in the South China Sea
Aleutian Islands (trailing 2250 km southwest of Alaska almost down to Kamtchatka)
